title: Police have identified victim in Thanksgiving club shooting
content:
ALBANY, NY (WRGB) Police have identified the victim who was shot and killed at a club on Thanksgiving morning.
Police say 26 year old Wendell Hill was shot and killed at Rocks at 77 Central Avenue.
Investigators say while the investigation is ongoing, detectives say the shooting was an isolated incident between two people who did know each other.
Police say three victims who sustained injuries during the incident were near Hill at the time of the shooting they are all expected to survive.
Anyone with further information about the incident is asked to call the Albany Police Detective Division at (518) 462-8039.
